## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G16090](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G16090)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtHRD1A, HRD1A</u>
- **Gene Name:** homolog of yeast Hrd1, homolog of yeast Hrd1
- **Description:**   RING/U-box superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2093422
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Gene Ontology:
   - [GO:1904276](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:1904276)&nbsp;---&nbsp;acts upstream of or within&nbsp;---&nbsp;regulation of wax biosynthetic process

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [hrd1a hrd1b]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Endoplasmic reticulum (ER)-associated degradation process is blocked in hrd1a hrd1b double mutant.
   - [hrd1a hrd1b]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced stem cuticular wax accumulation. Increased leaf and stem cutin monomers.
